pages.text: $(5)$(l)    //  $(3)The Elysian Project$(5)  Overview  // $(br2)$()    Only unreality can save reality. Saving our souls, is saving the entire humanity.$(br)    Our goal is to save humanity from the eternal tragedy of reality, and create a new world that makes everyone's dream come true.$(br)    The world is already ruined, we can only save ourselves if we unite together.$(br)

The Elysian Project is the last hope for humanity, anyone that get in its way should be destroyed.$(br)    $(3)Beyond Reality Co. Ltd.$() will dedicate on putting this project into effort and supply with technical support. As the largest VR company in the world, we are ambitious and confident.$(br2)Sep 19th, 2044
